name: Mobile
description: A dashboard for all your mobile app instrumenting needs.

rawConfiguration.text:
# Welcome to the New Relic Mobile dashboard! üì±üìä
## Before you start, make sure to follow this little instruction for maximum visibility. After that, you may delete this text box.

You may notice after installation that charts are showing no data. You can select a specific app to be the default in the variable dropdown labelled `Select Mobile App`:
- [ ] Click on the ‚úèÔ∏è icon in the top right-hand corner of the dashboard
- [ ] Click on the `Select Mobile App` variable dropdown in the top left-hand corner and then click **Edit**
- [ ] In the settings sidebar select an app from the `Default value` dropdown

The dashboard will default to data from this app and you can select any other app from the `Select Mobile App` dropdown.

 > NOTE: While some of the charts in this dashboard might work out of the box without an app selected, please bear in mind the results displayed will be an aggreagation of *all* mobile apps in your account.
 
 ---
 
 ‚ö†Ô∏è The dropdown list of apps is currently limited to 10000. If you have more than 10000 apps in your account you can adjust the NRQL query to narrow down results by:
- [ ] Click on the ‚úèÔ∏è icon in the top right-hand corner of the dashboard
- [ ] Click on the `Select Mobile App` variable dropdown and then click **Edit**
- [ ] Adjust the NRQL query to narrow down results e.g. `WHERE osName = 'iOS'`

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(uuid) FROM MobileRequest WHERE (appName = {{select_mobile_app}}) FACET `countryCode` SINCE 1 month ago EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT uniqueCount(appVersion) FROM MobileRequest WHERE (appName = {{select_mobile_app}}) FACET appVersion SINCE 1 month ago EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT uniqueCount(uuid) as 'Installed devices' FROM MobileUserAction WHERE (appName = {{select_mobile_app}}) SINCE 1 month ago COMPARE WITH 1 month ago
SELECT count(newrelic.timeslice.value) FROM Metric WHERE (appName = {{select_mobile_app}}) AND (metricTimesliceName = 'Session/Start') FACET `instanceName` SINCE 30 minutes ago TIMESERIES
SELECT uniqueCount(osVersion) FROM MobileRequest WHERE (appName = {{select_mobile_app}}) FACET osVersion SINCE 1 month ago EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT histogram(responseTime, 10, 10) FROM MobileRequest FACET `requestDomain` LIMIT 10 SINCE 43200 seconds ago EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT percentile(memUsageMb, 99) FROM MobileRequest WHERE (appName = {{select_mobile_app}}) TIMESERIES SINCE 43200 seconds ago EXTRAPOLATE

nrqlQuery.query: SELECT uniques(appName, 10000) FROM Mobile SINCE 1 week ago
